body.name: Addison 4-in-1 Convertible Mini Crib in Espresso, Greenguard Gold Certified, Non-Toxic Finishes, Built of New Zealand Pinewood, Comes with 1” Mattress Pad

byLineInfo.name: Visit the Dream On Me Store

deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 19 hrs
features: CONVERTIBILITY OPTIONS: Use the Addison 4-in-1 Convertible Mini Crib as a mini crib, mini daybed and twin-size bed to keep pace with your child! Comfortable and compact, it’s ideal to free up nursery space or to use in grandma’s home

MODERN DESIGN: Built of New Zealand pinewood, its minimalist design features gentle, smooth arches & sturdy spade feet. The contemporary styling allows it to blend easily into any nursery decor.To clean surface use only water on a damp cloth

BEAUTIFUL FINISHES: The Addison is available in five beautiful non-toxic baby-safe finishes - Cherry, Espresso, Black, Natural, White - which can match perfectly with whatever nursery theme you choose. Let your imagination reign supreme

MANY BENEFITS: The crib has a 3-position adjustable mattress height setting & Comes with a 1" OEM Mattress pad. For additional aftermarket mattress purchase, we recommend any Dream On Me, non-toxic, Greenguard certified mini crib mattress.

SCORES HIGH ON SAFETY: All Dream On Me cribs meet/exceed applicable JPMA, ASTM & CPSC standards. Product dimensions are 32Lx24Wx38H inches and the maximum weight limit is 50 lbs. All tools/assembly instructions included
body.description: What makes the Addison 4-in-1 Mini Convertible Crib a stylish and convenient nursery solution? Use it as a mini crib, mini daybed and twin-size bed (bed rails sold separately) to keep pace with your child! Comfortable yet compact, it’s ideal to free up nursery space or to use in grandma’s home. Built of New Zealand pinewood, its minimalist design features gentle, smooth arches & sturdy spade feet making it a beautiful piece of furniture. The contemporary styling allows it to blend easily into any nursery decor.The crib has a 3-position adjustable mattress height setting to accommodate your growing child & comes with the regulatory 1” mattress pad. Choose a Dream On Me non-toxic, Greenguard Gold certified portable crib mattress for a perfect fit. The Addison is available in beautiful non-toxic baby-safe finishes which can match perfectly with whatever nursery theme that you choose. All Dream On Me cribs meet/exceed applicable JPMA, ASTM & CPSC standards. Product dimensions are 38L x 24W x 32H inches and the maximum weight limit is 50 lbs. All tools/assembly instructions included.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The Addison 4-in-1 Convertible Mini Crib Small in size, yet packs up a punch - That’s the best way to describe the Addison 4-in-1 Convertible Mini Crib. It grows with your child, yet occupies a small footprint, freeing up nursery space. Safe, stylish and feature-heavy, it makes for the ideal addition to your nursery!

Useful Features That Will Delight Guaranteed Safety Meets all CPSC & ASTM standardsNon-toxic finishes Compact Design Sleek design makes it ideal for small spaces Mattress Matters Convenient three-height mattress setting to keep pace with your baby’s needsComes with the regulatory 1” mattress pad Durable & Sturdy Solid wood constructionBuilt of sustainable New Zealand pinewood

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for small spaces!
reviews.reviewText: This crib is a great color and style! It is sturdy and fits perfect in a very small space! Plenty of growing room for a baby as well!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2019
reviews.reviewText: I was nervous about buying the crib because I didn’t want to be disappointed, but I’m so glad I decided on the Addison crib. It was easy to assemble although I feel it would be easier with two people so someone can hold pieces in place, while the other one screws. My fault though I was too excited to out together I didn’t wait for my partner. It’s nice and sturdy, perfect color, and fits perfectly in the room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars We love our mini crib!!!
reviews.reviewText: Our baby is now 6 months, we bought it before she was born and it has worked amazing for us and continues to. It's sturdy and compact for our living space. I have no complaints! We absolutely love our mini crib and our little one hasn't had a complaint either! It was very easy to put together. The only thing we did have an issue with was a bolt and nut set had broken and we did replace it ourself,, however we did not contact the company to request a replacement peice. Would deffinately consider buying again if i needed a second crib!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 2, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Assembly is tricky because some of the Holes don’t line up right, causing small gaps. Overall though, I’m happy with the product. It’s sturdy and the fact that it converts will be helpful as my baby grows. My 11 month old will *hopefully* be happy to have his own sleep space. I only wish I’d purchased a mini crib sooner!We also purchased this mattress (Serta SleepTrue 4-Inch Mini Crib... https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07Z8QWF1M?ref=ppx_pop_mob_ap_share) and it fits perfectly. A little firm so I plan on using the pad that came with the mini crib as a topper, under a fitted sheet of course for safety.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 10, 2020
reviews.reviewText: I really like this mini crib! It fits perfectly in the limited space we have. My husband assembled it fairly quickly and without any stress. Everything went together perfectly. There are open holes where the screws go in but it doesn’t bother me at all. This is a very beautiful option!I added the picture just because I like to see items in real spaces. This area is by no means ready for my babe. He’s not due for another 9 weeks :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Follow the steps on the manual for fast and easy assembling
reviews.reviewText: It took me 1 1/2 hour to get it together, it comes with two tools which are the only ones you will need throughout the whole assembling process. It’s convenient for small rooms, very light weight but seems to be strong when its fully assembled. It comes with a thin mattress but I recommend to buy an extra one from Graco®️ Crib and Toddler MATTRESS-in-a-BOX. As a reference to show how big this crib is, I took a picture of how many tiles on the floor it takes. (3X4) nothing missing, nothing damaged like mentioned in other comments.All you need is a clear/well lit room and patience in order to build this up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect size for small space
reviews.reviewText: The wood color is rich! We love the size and the look! Great value!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great product, very nice sturdy material. Just the right size that I was looking for. Very happy with this purchase
